ing: 6 fluid ounces tomato and clam juice cocktail
des: "A fantastic drink often found north of the border. This will definitely liven up your traditional Bloody Mary."
ins: Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with celery salt. Place ice in the glass, and pour in vodka and tomato and clam juice cocktail. Mix in the bouillon powder, hot pepper sauce, and Worcestershire sauce. Garnish with celery.
